document.topic_text: SHERIFF’S BLOTTER July 29 Someone made criminal threats to a victim and her family in the 300 block of Roberts Avenue. Shoplifters stole merchandise from Kohl’s, 872 Los Angeles Ave. Aug. 1 A man, 20, was arrested for wearing gang attire in violation of his probation terms. A 55-year-old man was arrested in the 500 block of Los Angeles Avenue for drug use. A man, 35, was arrested at Princeton Avenue and Condor Drive on a warrant for failing to appear in court. A 58-year-old man was arrested in the 14000 block of Avenida Colonia on a warrant for burglary. He was also arrested for drug use and possession. A woman, 28, was arrested in the 600 block of Spring Road on a warrant for violating her probation. Aug. 2 A man, 31, was arrested at Los Angeles and Moorpark avenues for drug use and possessing drugs for sale. He was also arrested for battering his girlfriend. A woman, 19, was arrested at Grimes Canyon Road for possessing a switchblade knife. A man, 19, was also arrested for possessing drugs. A 20-year-old man and his 21-year-old girlfriend were arrested in the 50 block of Majestic Court for battering each other during a fight. Aug. 3
